parameters.name: command
parameters.description: Allows executing commands in a terminal     Must take into account the target operating system to generate proper command syntax: Windows: bash syntax Linux: bash syntax MacOS: bash syntax  Must resolve application names based on the system  Example: open 'calculator app' for Linux KDE: kcalc for Linux GNOME: gnome-calc for other....  The goal is to enable cross-OS command execution by handling differences in syntax, shells and application names
